$Gerber's return throw to 1B hit Kamm on the right side of his head, the ball bounding over LF foul line. Members of both clubs and both umpires debated in the middle of the diamond as to whether Elsh was entitled to 2B. When it was decided he was, the Browns continued to argue, delaying the game for several minutes.

$Summa stole 2B easily, but Schalk protested that Sewell had raised his bat and interfered with his effort to throw. The two umpires held a conference and Sewell was called out for interference. Manager Speaker continued to argue with both umpires and the game was delayed because of Ormsby's decision.

Fans booed, hissed, and jeered.
